summary: The package defines Django model classes that illustrate various one-to-one relationship configurations and supplies a thorough test suite that validates creation, assignment, deletion, querying, reverse lookups, caching, primaryâ€‘key handling, nullable fields, and behavior with unsaved instances.
business_intent: To confirm that Django's one-to-one field mechanics work correctly in all common and edge cases, providing regression protection and documentation for developers implementing such relationships.
